display_long_description:
Monking Around is a fast-paced, VR movement game where you swing, flip, crawl and parkour your way through vibrant maps as a monkey. Using only your hands to push, vault, and climb, you’ll chase down other players—or escape them It’s pure monkey chaos.

Dive into unique maps. Whether you're tagging your friends, mastering tricky obstacles, or just goofing off in the treetops, Monking Around is all about skillful movement and high-energy fun.

Customize your monkey, purchase new cosmetics, and explore evolving game modes that keep the experience fresh and unpredictable. With intuitive locomotion and a playful atmosphere, Monking Around brings out the wild in everyone.

Get ready to jump, swing, flip, crawl, and monkey around like never before! 🐒✨
